name: Bladers.io - Battle Tops
description:
Bladers.io is a combinaison between io game and beyblade.
Your favorite multiplayer real-time beyblade game is now available!

Spin Tops to crash others and stop them to win! Are you ready to be the master of this new io beyblade game?

Bladers.io allows you to compete against the world in a fast paced arena of spinning tops.

Bladers.io Strategy

- Smash enemies into obstacles.
- Use good timing and maneuver to dodge incoming opponents.
- Customize your tops.
- Compete with friends to survive the longest.
